name: Jawa Blaster
Lore: 'Built from scavenged parts, Jawa blaster are not required to adhere to any design standards. An etching on this stock warns ''datinni greb zroom.''',
Text: 'Deploy on your Jawa. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. If destiny -1 > defense value, target hit. If destiny = 0, Jawa Blaster ''explodes'' (weapon and character firing it are lost).',
